Articles.Content:
In the landing gear\'s CFG, change the 2nd attach paremeter from 0.147 to -0.150 to 'sink' the box into the attached part.

in *\KSP\smallGearBay\part.cfg:


// --- node definitions ---

node_attach = 0.00, -0.150, 0.00, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1
Inline? like 2 next to eachother? Could you include pictures of what it will look like ingame?
Instead of the gear\'s bay sitting outside of the part it\'s attached to (like a float pod on a water plane), it\'ll 'burry ' into the part like on an airplane.
Thank you, Braun. Personally, i dislike the protruding landing pods. Your mod makes many craft much more estetically pleasing!
